articles.title: The Cryptocurrency Industry Might Actually Benefit From an Ad Ban
articles.description: Google, Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Snap, and MailChimp have all decided to shut out cryptocurrency advertising, but some blockchain enthusiasts say that might not be such a bad thing.
